title: OCE Streamer SLaTer | Come have some fun, relax and win riot points just for following? ~~

embed.description: OCE | Ranked Gold V | Song Requests!

body:
I'm doing a social experiment on my friend (MWAHAHA!).

Come and bully SLaTer while he fails at League. Lord know he wants you there.

He's also such a sellout that he will literally GIVE you riot points for watching. (You have to win the points.. DUH!.. but all you have to do is watch ^.^)

So come along, if only for a few minutes. Smack that follow button and leave a nasty message.. We don't care..

Peace {{summoner:12}}
